page.title: 08THE MAY FAIR AND THE PAGEANT
page.content: The{May Fair}is an event held each year at St. Stephen's School. The theme selected for 1985 was 'Pirates'. Sidestalls,costumes, and competitions followed this theme in some way. Traditionally,{Maypole and modern {dancing}were central to the entertainment. During an assembly at school a{May Queen}and four attendants were chosen. Their task was to officially open the fair. In 1984 St.Stephen's School chose to celebrate their Silver Jubilee. Each of 8 classes presented and displayed a notable event from the last 25 years. The Queen's Jubilee Visits (1977), The Beatles (1962), Sir Francis Chichester (1966), The Royal Wedding (1981), The First Man on the Moon (1969),England winning the World Cup (1966), Britain joining the E.E.C. (1973), Building the School Swimming Pool (1970).
